glossaryid.title: ABSCESS
glossaryid.paragraph: Localised collection of pus surrounded by inflamed tissue.<sup>109</sup>

glossaryid.title: ADENOCARCINOMA
glossaryid.paragraph: Malignant tumour originating in glandular epithelium.<sup>110</sup>

glossaryid.title: Î±-INTERFERON
glossaryid.paragraph: Interferon produced by white blood cells that inhibit viral replication, suppress cell proliferation and regulate immune response, which is used in a form obtained from recombinant DNA to treat various diseases.<sup>109</sup>
